name: Astrum Heroes FREE
description:
Space team in searching for treasures at the hights of different worlds.Three heroes climb to unbelievable hights with rocket boots! This work is dangerous, but you can help!
And you can save your record in highscores!

In this game you will conquer of different places on earth. And even in space!
Compete with friends, collect bonuses and upgrade your characters!
There is 7 locations on your choice. The far you get — things get harder!

This is completely free version of game with some ads.
